Question: It has become known by many nicknames, including Dolly zoom, "Zolly," "this person Zoom," and "Vertigo Effect.".
Hints: Asked by a reporter why it had taken the Queen so long, this person quipped, "I suppose it was a matter of carelessness".
In 1929, this person began work on his tenth film Blackmail.
Harsh treatment and wrongful accusations are found frequently in this person's films.
